worklogs.comment:
naitoh commented on pull request #6266: ARROW-6841: [C++] Migrate to LLVM 8 and Updated Fedora 30
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6266
 
 
   - Migrate to LLVM 8.
   - linux-apt-jni.dockerfile update.
   - ci/docker/debian-10-cpp.dockerfile update
   - Commented out of ARROW_LLVM_VERSION_FALLBACK.
   - Updated Fedora from 29 to 30 to use LLVM8.
   
   All in all this wasn't too painful, and Gandiva seems to run fine.
   However, since the behavior of AlignAfterOpenBracket has changed in clang-format-8, a format error has occurred in Lint. This needs to be fixed.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
Now that LLVM 9 has been released, LLVM 8 has been promoted to stable according to 

http://apt.llvm.org/

comments.body: Are you thinking about Gandiva or about the build tools (clang-format etc.)?
I would think we would do everything at once.
